long_description: Versatility is the name of the game when you hike or travel in the women's prAna Sage Convertible Pants. Leave 'em long, roll 'em up to capri length, or unzip the legs to shorts. What's not to like?. Stretchy nylon/spandex fabric moves easily with you for freedom in hiking, bouldering and climbing stone steps in foreign countries. Durable water repellent finish helps light rain bead up and roll off, and resists stains. Pants dry quickly, so you can wash them in your sink at night and wear them in the morning. Side cargo pockets and back flap-covered pockets secure essentials. Interior side-seam tabs hold rolled-up pant legs at capri length. PrAna Sage Convertible pants for women feature a relaxed fit and mid rise.
short_description: Versatility is the name of the game when you hike or travel in the women's prAna Sage Convertible Pants. Leave 'em long, roll 'em up to capri length, or unzip the legs to shorts. What's not to like?.
